title: Simulation/VR-Based Learning Experience Design (LXD) Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device operation skills and beginner-level understanding of scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Customized science simulation education for professional learners in medical/legal/technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of designing effective learning experiences in simulation/VR environments by applying UXD principles
Learners can complete an LXD project through stages of audience analysis, scenario planning, and prototyping
Learners can submit design improvement proposals reflecting user feedback in VR-based science lab environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
